definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
stick/pole/lever/classifier for long objects such as guns

sentences.english: The types that cause disease are rare, Sadowski says.
sentences.chinese: 薩道斯基說，大腸桿菌會致病的種類很少。

sentences.english: The antibacterial ability of chitosan to E. coli was related to the protonation of amino group.
sentences.chinese: 殼聚糖對大腸桿菌的抑菌作用與其氨基的質子化有關。

sentences.english: German health authorities have not confirmed the source of E. coli.
sentences.chinese: 德國衛生當局目前還未確認大腸桿菌源頭。

sentences.english: These infections are often caused by Escherichia coli and Proteus mirabilis.
sentences.chinese: 這些感染經常有大腸桿菌和奇異變形桿菌引起。

sentences.english: Avian Escherichia coli pili antigen was detected with agar gel diffusion precipitin test.
sentences.chinese: 用瓊脂擴散沉澱反應檢測了大腸桿菌菌毛抗原。

sentences.english: Escherichia coli was checked out in part of tea sets and beddings .
sentences.chinese: 部分茶具上和臥具上檢出大腸桿菌。

sentences.english: Preparation and identification of the thermostable DNA polymerase expressed in E.
sentences.chinese: 耐熱DNA聚合酶在大腸桿菌中得到表達。

sentences.english: Enterotoxigenic escherichia coil (ETEC) related with diarrhoea of early-weaned piglets.
sentences.chinese: 產腸毒素性大腸桿菌與仔豬腹瀉的致病過程密切相關。

sentences.english: Progress in preparation and sterilizing mechanism of electrolyzed oxidizing water;
sentences.chinese: 目的以大腸桿菌爲對象，研究二氧化氯殺菌機理。

sentences.english: A triple serum has been developed to resist the Newcastledisease, colibacillosis and paretyphus avium in chickens.
sentences.chinese: 研製了抗雞新城疫大腸桿菌病副傷寒三聯血清。

sentences.english: Germany is struggling to control its E. coli health scare.
sentences.chinese: 德國正努力地控制大腸桿菌健康空幻。

sentences.english: Listeria monocytogenes and Salmonella than some of the common E. coli are more lethal.
sentences.chinese: 李斯特菌比常見的沙門氏菌和某些大腸桿菌更爲致命。

sentences.english: Objective To set up a new method of detecting E. coli.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立檢測與鑑定腸侵襲性大腸桿菌的新方法。

sentences.english: Cows carry the deadly strain of E. coli 0157 in their intestinal tract.
sentences.chinese: 牛的腸道內攜帶有致命的E大腸桿菌0157病毒。

sentences.english: The Escherichia coli strain DH42 is sensitive to high osmolarity in an alkaline medium.
sentences.chinese: 大腸桿菌DH42突變株鹼性條件下對高滲透壓敏感。

sentences.english: Objective To construct a bait plasmid in bacterial two-hybrid system.
sentences.chinese: 目的構建大腸桿菌雙雜交系統的誘餌重組質粒。

pinyin: you1 men2 luo2 xuan2 gan3 jun1

definition: stress/abbr. for 應激反應|应激反应[ying4 ji1 fan3 ying4]
